body.subject: Plan.json updated - all concerns addressed, implementation.json partial
body.summary: Reviewed updated plan.json - all concerns from review.json are addressed: security tests added (ws8_t2), performance tests added (ws8_t3), explicit coverage of all 12 AC in acceptance_criteria_test_coverage, explicit CI gates for security/performance/layer boundaries. Implementation.json created by developer, but contains only 2 of 18 tasks (ws1 completed, coverage 95.45%). Completion of all 18 tasks required for full quality review.
key_points: Plan.json updated correctly: all concerns from review.json addressed
Security tests added: ws8_t2 with explicit CI gates (pytest tests/security/god_agent/)
Performance tests added: ws8_t3 with explicit CI gates (pytest tests/performance/god_agent/ --benchmark-only)
Acceptance criteria test coverage: all 12 AC explicitly covered with test_location and test_type specified
CI gates updated: explicit commands added for security tests, performance tests, layer boundary validation
Implementation.json created: developer started implementation, 2 tasks from ws1 (Domain & Contracts) completed with coverage 95.45%
Implemented code verified: Intent, TaskPlan, Skill and other domain entities comply with requirements, tests written, mypy/lint pass
concerns: Implementation.json partial: only 2 of 18 tasks completed (ws1 completed, ws2-ws8 in progress)
Test_evidence partial: only unit tests for domain layer (coverage 95.45%), integration/smoke/security/performance tests not yet written
Full quality review requires: all 18 tasks completed, test_evidence for all test types (unit >= 80%, integration, smoke, security, performance), layer boundary validation
Current status: implementation.json created, but Epic 28 still not ready for release (only 11% of tasks completed)
body.action_needed: Plan.json updated correctly - all concerns addressed. Developer continues implementation per plan.json. After completion of all 18 tasks and provision of full test_evidence (coverage >= 80%, integration tests, smoke tests, security tests, performance tests), quality engineer will conduct full re-review to lift veto and set release_gate: true.

validation_status.test_evidence: partial (only domain layer unit tests, 95.45% coverage)

next_steps: After completion of all 18 tasks: provide full test_evidence
Quality engineer will conduct full re-review
If all quality gates pass: release_gate: true, deployment unblocked
